basics.name: Yixiao Liu
basics.summary: Robotics & control student focusing on dynamic modeling, optimal control (LQR/MPC), and simulation-based motion planning. Recent work includes manipulator dynamics/servo control and quadrotor trajectory optimization.

highlights: Focus: robotics, optimal control, and simulation
Projects under MEAM curriculum (manipulator dynamics, quadrotor trajectory optimization)
3+1+1 joint path with University of Pennsylvania

awards.title: Outstanding Course Project Award
awards.awarder: SJTU, ME3220: Design and Manufacture II

projects.name: UR16e Manipulator Simulation
projects.description: Full MATLAB/Simulink dynamics and trajectory tracking; modeling, controller tuning, and servo behavior analysis.

projects.name: Optimal Control Notes (LQR/MPC)
projects.description: Implementations and study notes for LQR/MPC with small benchmarks.

projects.name: Quadrotor Trajectory Optimization (Course Project)
projects.description: Minimum-snap trajectory generation and tracking; simulation and evaluation under constraints.
